executive_summary: The E-Book Publishing industry has undergone volatile behavior throughout the past decade but has grown alongside technological advances...

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Technology Acceptance Enables E-Books to Flourish
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The rise in the mainstream popularity of e-books has been closely tied to the introduction of handheld devices...

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Publishers Attempt to Ameliorate E-Book Pricing Conflicts
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: A substantial challenge the industry has encountered was related to price-setting...

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Remote Learning Provides Publishers With a Unique Growth Opportunity
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The amount of time spent in front of digital devices has spiked...

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Self-Publishing Platforms Democratize the E-Book Market
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Platforms like Amazon's Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP) and Wattpad provide accessible avenues for authors...

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: The Rise of Self-Publishing Poses a Threat to Industry Growth
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Following the rapid adoption of e-books, the industry is unlikely to exceed its historical share of the publishing market...

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: E-Book Publishers Look to Capitalize on Positive Market Conditions
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Rising per capita disposable income will boost e-book sales as readers have more money to spend on digital content...

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Subscription Models Are Slated to Alter Industry Dynamics
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Publishers and authors will adjust their strategies, focusing more on reader engagement metrics...

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: The Emergence of Audiobooks Siphons Away Demand From E-Book Publishers
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The rising popularity of audiobooks has increasingly challenged the E-Book Publishing industry...
